Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Harvester golems are malfunctioning, threatening the safety of the residents of the Freeholds.

Destroy {@LinkCreature:19#2001#crazed}, {@LinkCreature:19#2003#wild}, {@LinkCreature:19#3001#berserk}, and {@LinkCreature:19#3003#reaping} harvester golems.

Report to Kayina when the mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
